titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 8404) to repeal the Defense of Marriage Act and ensure respect for State regulation of marriage, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 8404) to repeal the Defense of Marriage Act and ensure respect for State regulation of marriage, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-608, by Ms. Scanlon.

The resolution makes in order a motion offered by the chair of the Committee on the Judiciary or his designee that the House concur in the Senate amendment to H.R. 8404. All points of order against consideration of the motion are waived. Rule provides for one hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 157.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1510.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 204 (Roll no. 512).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 8404.
